name: part_004
file: tmp_【#ホロアースライブ】AZKi × Mori Calliopeプロトライブ同時中継！ [M4_M9F6FsLo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope performing the final chorus of 'Dawn Blue'.
Instrumental transition with 'PROTOLIVE' logo reveal and fireworks.
MC segment where Mori Calliope greets the audience and reflects on the performance.
MC segment where AZKi greets the audience after her song.

subtitles.original: ...against tomorrow.
subtitles.english: ...against tomorrow.

subtitles.original: Chase the world that we have dreamed.
subtitles.english: Chase the world that we have dreamed.

subtitles.original: Dry your eyes and don't look back.
subtitles.english: Dry your eyes and don't look back.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、ともこんにちは！
subtitles.english: Hello everyone!

subtitles.original: 調子どうですか？
subtitles.english: How are you doing?

subtitles.original: hololive Englishの森カリオペです！
subtitles.english: I'm Mori Calliope from hololive English!

subtitles.original: あ〜、すごく楽しかったね。
subtitles.english: Ah, that was so much fun.

subtitles.original: このライブ、めちゃめちゃ素敵ですね。
subtitles.english: This live is really wonderful.

subtitles.original: メタバースすごい！わ〜！
subtitles.english: Metaverse is amazing! Wow!

subtitles.original: あ〜、この曲ね、懐かしいね、ホロライブオルタナティブ。
subtitles.english: Ah, this song brings back memories, Hololive Alternative.

subtitles.original:
でも、あの、日本語のリリックも英語のリリックも
本当に特別だから
subtitles.english:
But, you know, both the Japanese and English lyrics
are really special,

subtitles.original: これからでもよく聴いてほしいね。
subtitles.english: so I hope you'll continue to listen to them often.

subtitles.original:
じゃあ、皆さん、メタバースライブ
楽しんでくださいね！
subtitles.english:
Well then, everyone, please enjoy
the Metaverse live!

subtitles.original: ゆら ゆら 動いた この心とも
subtitles.english: Gently, gently, my heart moved along too

subtitles.original: 私はあの子になれなかったんだ
subtitles.english: I couldn't become that girl

subtitles.original: ゆら ゆら 風吹く 連れ去っていく
subtitles.english: Gently, gently, the wind blows and takes me away

subtitles.original: いいな いいな 私はさ 何も持ってなかった
subtitles.english: It's nice, it's nice. I didn't have anything.

subtitles.original:
canopus
作詞/作曲/編曲 瀬名航
AZKi
振付 中川大二朗
subtitles.english:
canopus
Lyrics/Composition/Arrangement: Wataru Sena
AZKi
Choreography: Daijiro Nakagawa

subtitles.original: 傾いてる気分を無視した
subtitles.english: I ignored my listing feelings

subtitles.original: 今日も無理して頑張っちゃうからな
subtitles.english: Because I'm going to push myself and work hard today too

subtitles.original: 振れ私 振れ私 進めるさ
subtitles.english: Shake me, shake me, I can move forward

subtitles.original: 今すぐに手に入れたいけど お預けかもね
subtitles.english: I want to get it right now, but it might be put on hold

subtitles.original: もしも今 叶うなら 届けたい
subtitles.english: If it could come true now, I want to reach out

subtitles.original: キラ キラ 輝け あの星みたいに
subtitles.english: Sparkle, sparkle, shine like that star

subtitles.original: あの子は私になれなかったんだ
subtitles.english: That girl couldn't become me

subtitles.original: キラ キラ 顔出す 嫉妬も正義も
subtitles.english: Sparkle, sparkle, peek out, both jealousy and justice

subtitles.original: そうか そうね あなたもさ ずっと一緒だった
subtitles.english: I see, that's right. You were always together too.

subtitles.original: キラ キラ 変わった この心そうだ
subtitles.english: Sparkle, sparkle, it changed, yes, this heart

subtitles.original: 私はあの子にならなかったんだ
subtitles.english: I didn't become that girl

subtitles.original: キラ キラ 季節を 増やしてみる
subtitles.english: Sparkle, sparkle, I'll try to increase the seasons

subtitles.original: そうだ そうだ 私はさ 全て持っている
subtitles.english: That's right, that's right. I have everything.

subtitles.original: ゆら ゆら 変わった この未来ども
subtitles.english: Gently, gently, it changed, even this future

subtitles.original: 私はあの子にならなかったんだ
subtitles.english: I didn't become that girl

subtitles.original: ゆら ゆら 掴んだ この運命と
subtitles.english: Gently, gently, I grasped it, with this fate

subtitles.original: 生きてみたい みんなとさ 今を離さないように
subtitles.english:
I want to try living with everyone,
so as not to let go of the now

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Virtual Singer、ホロライブ所属、AZKiです！
subtitles.english: Virtual Singer, from hololive, I'm AZKi!

subtitles.original: みんな楽しんでますかー？
subtitles.english: Is everyone having fun?

subtitles.original: はい、ホロアース...
subtitles.english: Yes, HoloEarth...
